message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $100 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can meet me at this price.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a deal, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
Hello Alice, thank you for your continued negotiation. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay up to $110 for the product.
